verses.verse: And Elijah <S%H452><s%> the Tishbite, <S%H8664><s%> who was of the inhabitants <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8453><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Ahab, <S%H256><s%> As the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> liveth, <S%H2416><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I stand, <S%H5975><s%> there shall not <S%H518><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> dew <S%H2919><s%> nor rain <S%H4306><s%> these <S%H428><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to my word. <S%H1697><s%>
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Get <S%H1980><s%> thee hence, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> and turn <S%H6437><s%> thee eastward, <S%H6924><s%> and hide thyself <S%H5641><s%> by the brook <S%H5158><s%> Cherith, <S%H3747><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

And it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> that thou shalt drink <S%H8354><s%> of the brook; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5158><s%> and I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> the ravens <S%H6158><s%> to feed <S%H3557><s%> thee there. <S%H8033><s%>

So he went <S%H1980><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> according unto the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for he went <S%H1980><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> by the brook <S%H5158><s%> Cherith, <S%H3747><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

And the ravens <S%H6158><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> him bread <S%H3899><s%> and flesh <S%H1320><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and bread <S%H3899><s%> and flesh <S%H1320><s%> in the evening; <S%H6153><s%> and he drank <S%H8354><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the brook. <S%H5158><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> after <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7093><s%> a while, <S%H3117><s%> that the brook <S%H5158><s%> dried up, <S%H3001><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> there had been <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> rain <S%H1653><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> get <S%H1980><s%> thee to Zarephath, <S%H6886><s%> which <S%H834><s%> belongeth to Zidon, <S%H6721><s%> and dwell <S%H3427><s%> there: <S%H8033><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> a widow <S%H490><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> to sustain <S%H3557><s%> thee.

So he arose <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> to Zarephath. <S%H6886><s%> And when he came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the gate <S%H6607><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the widow <S%H490><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> was there <S%H8033><s%> gathering <S%H7197><s%> of sticks: <S%H6086><s%> and he called <S%H7121><s%> to <S%H413><s%> her, and said, <S%H559><s%> Fetch <S%H3947><s%> me, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in a vessel, <S%H3627><s%> that I may drink. <S%H8354><s%>

And as she was going <S%H1980><s%> to fetch <S%H3947><s%> it, he called <S%H7121><s%> to <S%H413><s%> her, and said, <S%H559><s%> Bring <S%H3947><s%> me, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> a morsel <S%H6595><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> in thine hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And she said, <S%H559><s%> As the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> liveth, <S%H2416><s%> I have <S%H3426><s%> not <S%H518><s%> a cake, <S%H4580><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> a handful <S%H4393><s%> <S%H3709><s%> of meal <S%H7058><s%> in a barrel, <S%H3537><s%> and a little <S%H4592><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> in a cruse: <S%H6835><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am gathering <S%H7197><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sticks, <S%H6086><s%> that I may go in <S%H935><s%> and dress <S%H6213><s%> it for me and my son, <S%H1121><s%> that we may eat <S%H398><s%> it, and die. <S%H4191><s%>

And Elijah <S%H452><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not; <S%H408><s%> go <S%H935><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> as thou hast said: <S%H1697><s%> but <S%H389><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> me thereof <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> a little <S%H6996><s%> cake <S%H5692><s%> first, <S%H7223><s%> and bring <S%H3318><s%> it unto me, and after <S%H314><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> for thee and for thy son. <S%H1121><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> The barrel <S%H3537><s%> of meal <S%H7058><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> waste, <S%H3615><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the cruse <S%H6835><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> fail, <S%H2637><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sendeth <S%H5414><s%> rain <S%H1653><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the earth. <S%H127><s%>

And she went <S%H1980><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> according to the saying <S%H1697><s%> of Elijah: <S%H452><s%> and she, <S%H1931><s%> and he, <S%H1931><s%> and her house, <S%H1004><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> many days. <S%H3117><s%>

And the barrel <S%H3537><s%> of meal <S%H7058><s%> wasted <S%H3615><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> did the cruse <S%H6835><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> fail, <S%H2637><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he spoke <S%H1696><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Elijah. <S%H452><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> after <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, <S%H1697><s%> that the son <S%H1121><s%> of the woman, <S%H802><s%> the mistress <S%H1172><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> fell sick; <S%H2470><s%> and his sickness <S%H2483><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> so <S%H3966><s%> sore, <S%H2389><s%> that <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> there was no <S%H3808><s%> breath <S%H5397><s%> left <S%H3498><s%> in him.

And she said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Elijah, <S%H452><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> have I to do with thee, O thou man <S%H376><s%> of God? <S%H430><s%> art thou come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me to call <S%H853><s%> my sin <S%H5771><s%> to remembrance, <S%H2142><s%> and to slay <S%H4191><s%> <S%H853><s%> my son? <S%H1121><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her, Give <S%H5414><s%> me <S%H853><s%> thy son. <S%H1121><s%> And he took <S%H3947><s%> him out of her bosom, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2436><s%> and carried him up <S%H5927><s%> into <S%H413><s%> a loft, <S%H5944><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> abode, <S%H3427><s%> and laid <S%H7901><s%> him upon <S%H5921><s%> his own bed. <S%H4296><s%>

And he cried <S%H7121><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> hast thou also <S%H1571><s%> brought evil <S%H7489><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the widow <S%H490><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> sojourn, <S%H1481><s%> by slaying <S%H4191><s%> <S%H853><s%> her son? <S%H1121><s%>

And he stretched himself <S%H4058><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the child <S%H3206><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> times, <S%H6471><s%> and cried <S%H7121><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> let this <S%H2088><s%> child's <S%H3206><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> come into him again. <S%H7725><s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H7130><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Elijah; <S%H452><s%> and the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the child <S%H3206><s%> came into him again, <S%H7725><s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H7130><s%> and he revived. <S%H2421><s%>

And Elijah <S%H452><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the child, <S%H3206><s%> and brought him down <S%H3381><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the chamber <S%H5944><s%> into the house, <S%H1004><s%> and delivered <S%H5414><s%> him unto his mother: <S%H517><s%> and Elijah <S%H452><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> See, <S%H7200><s%> thy son <S%H1121><s%> liveth. <S%H2416><s%>

And the woman <S%H802><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Elijah, <S%H452><s%> Now <S%H6258><s%> by this <S%H2088><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art a man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in thy mouth <S%H6310><s%> is truth. <S%H571><s%>
